TABLE 3   Underemployed Persons by Hours Worked and Sector, and Unemployed Persons by Age Group, Sex, and Highest Grade Completed with Measures of Precision, Philippines: 
January 2021p, February 2021p, March 2021p, April 2021p, May 2021p, June 2021p, July 2021p, August 2021p, September 2021p, October 2021p, November 2021p, and December 2021p
Hours Worked/Major Industry Group/Age Group/Sex/ Highest Grade Completed
Notes: Details may not add up to totals due to rounding.
All estimates used the 2015 POPCEN-based Population Projection.
1 - Preliminary estimate excludes Sulu and Tawi-tawi.
Source: Philippine Statistics Authority, Labor Force Survey
